channel.title: Pickup command

item.title: Pickup command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“jester01445, post:13, topic:259547”]on my sever i have to do ::pickup 0995 2000 for 2k…

and here you go ill spoonfeed this is my pickup it works perfect

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon TYPE IT AGAIN!"); }

Trust me it works[/quote]
No duh it works…you just copied and pasted…

Read full topic

@jester01445 wrote:

on my sever i have to do ::pickup 0995 2000 for 2k…

and here you go ill spoonfeed this is my pickup it works perfect

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon TYPE IT AGAIN!"); }

Trust me it works

item.title: Pickup command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Actually, the reason it doesn’t work is because you need 5 digits in your ID.
Normally it would be ::pickup 995 2000 for 2k.
Now you would have to type ::pickup 00995 2000 for 2k.

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command
item.dc:creator: @xdeathxmagex xdeathxmagex
item.description:
@xdeathxmagex wrote:

Haha imamtai, you gave him the wrong one.

        if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights == 3)) {
            try {
                int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
                int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

                if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                    addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                } else {
                    sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
            }
        }

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

can someone give me the coding for a pickup command.

when i use the command i just get the "Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! " bit, at any playerrights

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
        }
    }

[/code]

Read full topic
